Plot: A spy breaks up with his girlfriend after another false accusation of infidelity, and in her rage, she discovers his true occupation as a spy and blows his cover to the arms dealer who is looking for him.
Title: Blowback
Writer: Aaron Thomas (screenplay), Aaron Thomas (story), Robert Yahnke (story)
Actors: Jessen Noviello, Alexandra Bromstad, Megan Brotherton, Scott Vance
